basics.name: Simone Rossetti
basics.label: Senior Deep Learning Scientist
basics.summary: AI Research Engineer specializing in natural language processing and computer vision. Over five years of experience leading AI teams and developing scalable, production-grade models. Published at top-tier venues and involved in EU-funded multidisciplinary research. Focused on bridging theory and application through algorithmic innovation, model optimization, and scientific communication to build robust, impactful AI systems.

work.name: DeepPlants S.r.l.
work.summary: Co-founded DeepPlants, an AI research startup advancing agricultural digitalization and intelligent automation. Led a team of engineers and scientists developing AI systems for plant phenotyping and agri-tech automation. Collaborated with plant biologists to integrate domain knowledge into model development. Co-authored EU proposals and white papers in sustainable agri-tech, and mentored researchers on reproducible ML workflows and dataset curation. Developed and trained vision and language models on multi-GPU setups, optimizing data pipelines for efficient large-scale training.
highlights: Led AI teams building production-grade vision and vision-language systems for plant phenotyping
Optimized multi-GPU training pipelines and large-scale data workflows
Contributed to EU proposals and multidisciplinary research outputs

work.name: Sapienza Università di Roma (DIAG)
work.summary: Research grant position in the Department of Computer, Control and Management Engineering (DIAG). Conducted research in artificial intelligence and computer vision, contributing to ongoing research projects and publications.
highlights: Computer vision research and publications in an academic lab setting

work.name: VIK School S.r.l.
work.summary: Developed adaptive learning tools and interactive platforms compliant with accessibility standards. Collaborated with UX/UI teams to translate pedagogical requirements into user-centered design solutions.
